title: De Koven, Weidmann, and Public Execution in France (Pt. 2)
itunes:title: De Koven, Weidmann, and Public Execution in France (Pt. 2)
description:
Once Eugen Weidmann was in police custody, he confessed to Jean's murder as well as several others. As the trial and execution played out, public interest grew to such a frenzied state that authorities immediately reconsidered the practice of performing executions publicly.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Once Eugen Weidmann was in police custody, he confessed to Jean's murder as well as several others. As the trial and execution played out, public interest grew to such a frenzied state that authorities immediately reconsidered the practice of performing executions publicly.

itunes:keywords: 20th century, murders, executions, guillotine, European history, France, crime, Eugene Weidmann, public executions, Jean De Koven
